mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_api_usage_limits (user_id, provider, date, daily_count, monthly_count, last_reset_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{provider}, #{date}, 1, 1, DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-01')) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE daily_count = daily_count + 1, monthly_count = CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m') THEN monthly_count + 1 ELSE 1 END, last_reset_date = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-01'), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
